definitions.definition: A container or other device for storing or organizing loose items in a tidy fashion.
labels: now chiefly in combination with a modifier
definitions.label_groups: now chiefly in combination with a modifier

definitions.definition: A cover, often of tatting , drawn work, or other ornamental work, for the back of a chair , the arms of a sofa , etc.

main_definition: ( now chiefly in combination with a modifier ) A container or other device for storing or organizing loose items in a tidy fashion.
secondary_definitions: A cover, often of tatting , drawn work, or other ornamental work, for the back of a chair , the arms of a sofa , etc.
